title: Bug 120922: Improve 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor
description: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, the user receives an error message stating that they need to save their changes. However, the user is unsure how to save or discard their changes. Additionally, the error message is not very clear. The error message currently displayed is 'Source page is dirty.' Furthermore, the dialog box title is labeled 'Error' (including the quotes).
OB: If you edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then try to switch back to the Layout view, you will receive an error message indicating that you need to save your changes. The issue is that the user has to figure out what action they need to take to save the changes or discard them, which can be difficult. Additionally, the error message itself is not very informative.
EB: The XML Report Design has been modified. The dialog box should display a clear and informative title (without quotes).
